messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Need game. Now. Photography
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/10/03 11:11:14 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Oh,.. everyone in my family LOVES photography.  We have 2 still 35mm cameras and a digital
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/10/03 11:11:14 PM Eastern Standard Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:

> ooh, I really like this idea! I think photography is a fabulous way to look
>
> at the world through a different lense, literally

Oh,.. everyone in my family LOVES photography. We have 2 still 35mm cameras
and a digital camera ( its broken right now!!.. gosh, that could be another
whole thread.. it got broken when Landon took it to school with him!!) The
digital camera ( when its working) is so wonderful cuz the kids can take all
the pix they want , see them right away, and delete the ones they dont like.
Landon has taken some REALLY good pictures.

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
